blocks.title: test3National WWI Museum and Memorial
blocks.description: A comprehensive museum offering a profound look at the history of World War I with a vast collection of artifacts, personal stories, and interactive exhibits. The memorial offers panoramic views of the city.

blocks.title: Nelson-Atkins Museum of Art
blocks.description: An exceptional museum showcasing art from around the world, including European paintings, Asian art, and modern collections. The outdoor sculpture park is also a popular attraction.

blocks.title: Kansas City Zoo
blocks.description: One of the largest zoos in the U.S., featuring over 1,700 animals and engaging exhibits like the African Safari, Tiger Trail, and Polar Bear Passage.

blocks.title: Country Club Plaza
blocks.description: A beautiful, historic shopping district with Spanish-inspired architecture. The area features high-end shops, restaurants, fountains, and cultural events, especially during the holiday season.

blocks.title: Kauffman Stadium
blocks.description: Home of the Kansas City Royals, this stadium is perfect for baseball fans. Enjoy the games, and check out the Royals Hall of Fame for a glimpse into the team's rich history.

blocks.title: Union Station
blocks.cap: 30 W Pershing Rd, Kansas City, MO 64108
blocks.description: This historic station is a transportation hub and home to attractions like Science City, a giant model train exhibit, and various shops and restaurants. It often hosts seasonal events.

blocks.title: Worlds of Fun
blocks.cap: 4545 Worlds of Fun Avenue, Kansas City, MO 64161
blocks.description: An expansive amusement park featuring seven roller coasters, numerous thrill rides, and a large water park called Oceans of Fun. It's a family-friendly destination offering entertainment for all ages.

blocks.title: Kauffman Center for the Performing Arts
blocks.description: A state-of-the-art venue hosting a variety of performances, including concerts, ballets, operas, and theater productions. The center is renowned for its stunning architecture and acoustics.
